hotel.name: Grand Wailea, A Waldorf Astoria Resort
hotel.address: 3850 Wailea Alanui Dr, Wailea, HI 96753, United States
hotel.description: Fronting the most beautiful beach on Maui, Grand Wailea, A Waldorf Astoria Resort promises an experience like no other. This luxurious 40-acre resort features world-class amenities including the award-winning Spa Grande, nine pools with waterslides, renowned dining venues, and direct access to Wailea Beach. Immerse yourself in Hawaiian culture through lei making, hula lessons, and traditional luaus while enjoying spectacular ocean views and tropical gardens.

activities.text: Sunrise Tour to Haleakala National Park
Road to Hana Adventure with Waterfall Stops
